zh: 信驊科技首次參加INFOCOMM 2023展出全系列智慧AV應用，強化AV-OVER-IP高畫質傳輸解決方案以及智慧巡檢工廠戰情室應用

2023年6月13日 - 全球第一大遠端伺服器管理晶片供應商信驊科技（ASPEED Technology Inc.）首次參加美國奧蘭多InfoComm專業影音設備展，展出全系列智慧AV應用產品，包含AST1530/1535 AV-over-IP高畫質影像傳輸控制系統單晶片(SoC)，並可搭配信驊科技Cupola360系列全景多影像拼接影像處理晶片以及Cupola360全景360度攝影機，完美提供智慧巡檢工廠戰情室及指揮中心等多元應用，展會上亦展出一系列360度以及 180 度多鏡頭視訊會議設備。

信驊科技AV-over-IP影音延伸控制系統單晶片採用獨家的影像壓縮演算技術，即使經由遠距離網路線或光纖傳輸影像品質亦幾乎毫無耗損，提供零時差低延遲反應。AST1530/1535 HDMI2.1 AVoIP SoC特別針對高階專業影音傳輸應用而設計，具備4K2K60高畫質解析度，不僅支援1對1 AV影像傳輸控制，亦可透過既有IP網路架構支援Multi-input對Multi-output高畫質影像矩陣切換。本次展會信驊科技亦宣布與專業數位網路音訊技術供應商Audinate策略聯盟合作，AST1530/1535 AVoIP SoC將可搭載Dante® AV-A軟體解決方案，Dante®影音軟體可在AST1530/1535 AVoIP SoC硬體平台上直接運作而無需任何額外硬體需求，此一合作對於雙方可說是雙贏策略，目前業已獲得九家國際AV影音視聽大廠採用。AST1530/1535 AVoIP SoC可支援 HDR10/10+ Dolby Vision以及HDCP2.2/2.3，並提供多元電視牆拼接旋轉等各項功能（順時針 90/180/270度、水平翻轉、垂直翻轉），其他功能包含影像預覽小碼流 (MJPEG)、支援USB2.0 over IP (含webcam裝置)、KM over IP漫遊、AES256加密等。
信驊科技多年耕耘360度影像處理技術有成，本次亦展出Cupola360系列全新應用；除了持續發展既有的全景視訊會議應用，今年並推出完整智慧AV解決方案（Smart AV Solutions），主打智能影音應用平台，產品系列包含Cupola360全景影像處理晶片、全景攝影機，全方位建構360度智慧工廠遠端即時巡檢解決方案及智慧城市應用，積極朝創新多元應用發展。

信驊科技首創360度沉浸式智能攝影機，可大量運用於智慧巡檢，藉由廣泛佈建攝影機於工廠廠房及公共設施，透過超高解析度360度攝影機取代傳統魚眼設備，具備5.7K高畫質影像及無死角優勢，可在不同360度攝影機間作多點跳躍巡檢，工廠管理人員及客戶無需實地進入產線即可完成全方位管理，搭配信驊科技AVoIP高畫質遠端傳輸系統單晶片AST1530/1535 SoC，將可作為智慧工廠戰情室管控中心應用，隨時進行遠端監看管理。採用Cupola360晶片之全景攝影機具備即時360度可視範圍（FOV）及5.7K超高影像解析度，相片解析度超過8K，透過Cupola360⁺軟體及AI功能可即時回饋各定點資訊如工廠產線數據等，亦可局部定位格放擷取高解析度畫面以確認細節，解決傳統魚眼相機影像邊緣失真等缺點；未來將與全球系統整合商、經銷商等生態鏈夥伴共同合作，透過Cupola360技術品牌推廣建構此智慧工廠場域乃至於智慧城市應用。
信驊科技AST1530/1535 AV-over-IP SoC以及Cupola360 360度視訊會議及智慧工廠巡檢解決方案將於6月14日至16日在美國奧蘭多InfoComm展會Booth#2881盛大展出，歡迎前來信驊科技攤位親臨體驗。更多相關資訊，請參考www.aspeedtech.com。

信驊科技創立於2004年，為總部位於新竹的 Fabless 無晶圓廠領導 IC 設計公司。身為創新 SoC 解決方案的先驅和領導者，信驊科技專注於利基市場，推出兩大產品線：雲端企業解決方案及智慧 AV 解決方案。雲端企業解決方案產品涵蓋遠端伺服器管理晶片（Baseboard Management Controller SoC，BMC SoC）、BIC 晶片（Bridge IC）及 PFR 安全性晶片；智慧AV解決方案則包含 AVoIP 影音延伸管理晶片、Cupola360 全景影像處理晶片以及 Cupola360⁺ 相關軟體。信驊科技致力於研發創新技術以快速因應客戶需求，2016 年併購博通旗下 Emulex Pilot™ 伺服器遠端系統管理晶片事業，2018 年推出 Cupola360 全景影像處理晶片暨軟體解決方案，將產品線擴及影像領域。自 2014 年以來，信驊科技連續九年榮獲富比士雜誌（Forbes）評選為「亞太地區200大最佳中小企業」（Asia's 200 Best Under a Billion），是客戶值得信賴的合作夥伴。2022 年則獲台灣董事學會及企業發展研究中心評選為「外資精選台灣百強」（Taiwan Best-in-Class 100）。欲了解更多訊息，請參訪ASPEED官方網站：www.aspeedtech.com。
en: ASPEED Technology showcased a Full Range of Smart AV Applications at InfoComm 2023, Reinforcing AV-over-IP High-Definition Transmission Solutions, and Smart Patrolling for Factory Command Center Applications

Orlando, Florida – June, 2023 - ASPEED Technology Inc., the world's largest BMC SoC (system-on-chip) provider, successfully exhibited at the professional audiovisual exhibition InfoComm in Orlando, Florida from June 14th to 16th. The company showcased a full range of Smart AV application products, including the AST1530/1535 AV-over-IP high-definition transmission SoCs. The SoCs can be paired with ASPEED's Cupola360 180-degree and 360-degree cameras, providing perfect solutions for various applications such as smart patrolling for factory command centers and control rooms. The exhibition also featured a series of Cupola360 360-degree video conferencing devices.

ASPEED Technology's AV-over-IP SoC solutions utilize exclusive image compression algorithms, ensuring nearly lossless image quality even through long-distance network cables or fiber optic transmission, providing real-time response of low latency. Designed specifically for high-end professional audiovisual (Pro AV) applications, the AST1530/1535 HDMI2.1 AVoIP SoC supports 4K2K60 high-definition resolution. It not only enables 1-to-1 AV long distance transmission but also supports multi-input to multi-output 4K HDMI matrix through existing IP infrastructure.

During this exhibition, ASPEED also announced a strategic alliance with Audinate, the leading provider of professional AV networking technologies. The AST1530/1535 AVoIP SoCs can incorporate the Dante® AV-A software solution, and the Dante® audio software can operate directly on the AST1530/1535 AVoIP SoCs without any additional hardware requirements. This collaboration is a win-win strategy for both parties and has already been adopted by nine international AV audiovisual industry leaders. The AST1530/1535 AVoIP SoCs supports HDR10/10+ Dolby Vision and HDCP2.2/2.3, and provides various features such as multi-screen video wall splicing and rotation (CW 90/180/270 degrees, horizontal flip, vertical flip). Other features include MJPEG video preview stream, support for USB2.0 over IP webcam devices, KM over IP roaming, AES256 encryption, and more.

ASPEED has achieved significant advancements in 360-degree image processing technology through years of dedicated research and development. In this exhibition, ASPEED showcased the new Cupola360 series applications. In addition to continuously developing the existing 360-degree video conferencing applications, this year ASPEED launched a comprehensive series of Smart AV Solutions, including the Cupola360 spherical image SoC and 360-degree cameras, to build a complete 360-degree real-time remote patrolling solutions for smart factory and smart city applications, actively driving innovation and diverse applications.

ASPEED has pioneered the development of immersive intelligent 360-degree cameras, which can be widely deployed as smart patrolling in factories. By extensively installing cameras in factory buildings, traditional fisheye devices can be replaced with high-resolution Cupola360 cameras. The Cupola360 cameras offer advantages such as 5.7K high-definition imaging with no blind spots and the photo resolution exceeds 8K. Multiple cameras can be used for multi-point inspections, allowing factory managers and customers to achieve comprehensive management without physically entering the production line. When combined with ASPEED 's AST1530/1535 AV-over-IP SoCs, they can be used as control room applications for smart factory, enabling remote monitoring and management at any time.

Through Cupola360+ software and AI features, they can provide real-time feedback on specific information, such as factory production line data. They can also selectively zoom in on high-resolution images to confirm details, addressing the drawbacks of edge distortion in traditional fisheye cameras. Moving forward, ASPEED welcomes system integrators, distributors, and other partners in the ecosystem to collaborate and join in promoting the Cupola360 technology brand, contributing to the development of smart factory and even smart city applications.

Founded in 2004, ASPEED Technology Inc. is a leading fabless IC design company headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan. As a pioneer and leader of cutting-edge SoC solutions with a focus on the niche markets, ASPEED specializes in Cloud & Enterprise Solutions, including Baseboard Management Controller (BMC) SoC, Bridge IC, and PFR SoC, and Smart AV Solutions, including AVoIP SoC, Cupola360 Spherical Image Processor and Cupola360⁺ Software Kit. ASPEED is devoted to developing innovative technologies in order to quickly respond to customer needs. In 2016, ASPEED acquired Broadcom's Emulex Pilot™ remote server management chip business and it’s currently the world's No. 1 BMC SoC provider. To enter the market of image processing, ASPEED expanded its product portfolio by launching Cupola360 Spherical Image Processor and Cupola360⁺ software solutions in 2018. Recognized as a trusted and reliable partner for customers, ASPEED has been awarded "Forbes Asia's 200 Best Under a Billion" for nine consecutive years since 2014. The company was also recognized as “Taiwan Best-in-Class 100” by Taiwan Institute of Directors and CDRC Consulting Group in 2022.
